data.title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
data.meta_description: The Mirror Has Two Faces is a romantic\comedy\drama film directed & produced by Barbra Streisand. The film was released on November 15, 1996 by TriStar Pictures. data.text:
The Mirror Has Two Faces is a romantic\comedy\drama film directed & produced by Barbra Streisand.

The film was released on November 15, 1996 by TriStar Pictures. It is loosely based on the 1958 French film "Le Miroir à deux" and is about a homely woman who becomes a beauty which causes problems in her marriage.

Barbra portrayed the role of Rose Morgan in the film.
